When Revealed: Lower the power of each card in your opponent's hand by 1.
When Revealed: Gain +2 power for each enemy card here.
When ANY other card is played here, lower that card's power by 1.
When Revealed: Discard your other cards here, gain +2 power for each discarded.
When Revealed: Move away an enemy card here with the lowest power.
When Revealed: Gain +5 power if there is exactly one enemy card here.
When Revealed: Give cards in your hand +1 power.
When Revealed: Both players draw a card.
When Revealed: Gain +2 power for each card in your discard pile.
When Revealed: Doubles its power if its the strongest card here.
When Revealed: Gain +2 power for each of your other cards here.
When Revealed: Moves to another location.
Add two copies to your hand when this card is discarded.
When Revealed: Add a copy with +1 power to your hand.
End of Turn: Loses 1 power if not winning this location.
When Revealed: Set ALL cards here to 3 power.
When Revealed: Lower the power of each enemy card here by 1.
Gain +1 power when you play another card here.
When Revealed: Gain +1 mana next turn.
When Revealed: Lower the cost of 2 cards in your hand by 1.
When Revealed: Discard the lowest power card in your hand.
When Revealed: Draw a card from your opponent's deck.
When Revealed: If no ally cards are here, lower this card's power by 5.
End of Turn: Gains +1 power, but is discarded when its power is greater than 7.
End of Turn: Give your cards at each other location +1 power if they have unique powers.
When Revealed: Discards your other cards here, add their power to this card.
End of Turn: Loses 1 power if your side of this location is full.
When Revealed: Add a Wooden Cow to each other location.
End of Turn: Discard this.
When Revealed: Add a copy of the last card you played to your hand.
